summary: This document is an email chain discussing a passport found in Jeffrey Epstein's safe. The passport bears the name Marius Fortelni, lists Saudi Arabia as the residence, and has Epstein's photo on it. The email discusses efforts to contact the real Marius Fortelni to understand the connection.

persons.name: Marius Fortelni
persons.role: Individual whose identity appears on a passport found in Epstein's safe
persons.context: A passport bearing his name, with Saudi Arabia as the residence country, and Jeffrey Epstein's photo was found in Epstein's safe. He reportedly lived in Southampton and had lived in Saudi Arabia.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Subject of investigation; owner of the safe where the passport was found
persons.context: A passport with another man's identity (Marius Fortelni) but Epstein's photo was found in his safe.

connections.description: Epstein possessed a fraudulent passport bearing Fortelni's identity details but with Epstein's own photograph.

events.title: Email discussion about fraudulent passport
events.description: Law enforcement officials discuss via email a passport found in Jeffrey Epstein's safe that is in the name of Marius Fortelni but bears Epstein's photo, and their plan to contact the real Fortelni.

keyFacts: A passport in the name of Marius Fortelni was found in Jeffrey Epstein's safe.
The passport listed Saudi Arabia as the country of residence.
The passport bore a photograph of Jeffrey Epstein, not Marius Fortelni.
Law enforcement was attempting to contact the real Marius Fortelni to determine why his identity was on a passport in Epstein's possession.
